name: Sokodroid
description:
More than 200+ levels of Sokoban-inspired puzzle fun with a slick and vibrant Android theme.

Instructions:

  • Move the green droid around using the arrow keys
  • Push all yellow boxes onto purple goals
  • Boxes on top of goals are shown red
  • You can't pull boxes
  • You can't push more than one box in front of you
  • Press 'Z' to undo one move
